## buildEcommerceTransaction() function

Build an Ecommerce Transaction Event Allows for tracking common ecommerce events, this event is usually used when a consumer completes a transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function buildEcommerceTransaction(event: EcommerceTransactionEvent): PayloadBuilder;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | EcommerceTransactionEvent | Contains the properties for the Ecommerce Transactoion event  PayloadBuilder to be sent to  |

<b>Returns:</b>

PayloadBuilder
